These tragedies transcend borders and impact the interests of the U.S. and our our allies.

.@SenCoryGardner and I are holding a Foreign Relations hearing on our #ARIA law and fostering U.S. leadership in promoting human rights. Witnesses will share their perspectives on the human rights abuses against Uighurs, Tibetans, and Rohingya.
